channel.title: Changing how strong the NPC's are!
channel.description:
How do i change how strong the NPC's are, becouse a normal level 48 hobgoblin hits 28 and has 293hp!
How do I change this thankz,
- toonshortys

item.title: Changing how strong the NPC's are!
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

is there a way to change that for all of them without having to put every single NPC?

Read full topic
item.source: Changing how strong the NPC's are!

item.title: Changing how strong the NPC's are!
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

[quote=“ownage plz, post:3, topic:131864”]Actually npc’s max hit is based off how much hitpoints it has go into npchandler and look for

newNPC.MaxHit = (int)Math.floor((HP / 10));

Owned, once again he amazes me

Read full topic
item.source: Changing how strong the NPC's are!

item.title: Changing how strong the NPC's are!
item.dc:creator: @mr_monkey mr monkey
item.description:
@mr_monkey wrote:

Go into NPChandler.java and find this

	public boolean AttackPlayer(int NPCID) {

Then under something like this…

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2029) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30);//Torag
Add something like this…

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == ####) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(##);

where it sez

misc.random(##);

Replace the ## with the maxhit you want the npc(s) to hit

Read full topic
item.source: Changing how strong the NPC's are!
